text: These are the list of personnel changes in the NBA from the 1976–77 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July ?, 1976 to June 13, 1977), see the links below ==References== *NBA Transactions at NBA.com *1976-77 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions Category:NBA transactions
title: List of 1976–77 NBA season transactions
